item.description: I have taken part in many game projects, either in a team or on my own to acquire skills, improve the existing ones and have fun, here’s a list of the main ones.line Spartan Engine Click on the “Game Engine” tab above or here to navigate to the project’s dedicated page. Download: Click here (GitHub repository which includes source code and binaries) Development: AngelScript, Assimp, Bullet, C++, DirectX11, FMOD, FreeImage, HLSL, Qt, Visual Studio.
